mapper.select:
select
from comment where song_list_id=#{songListId} order by create_time desc

select
from comment where song_id=#{songId} order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update comment set up=up+1 where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select c.id,u.username,u.sex,c.content,c.up from comment c left join consumer u on c.user_id=u.id where c.song_list_id=#{songListId}
